description.0: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

0.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by <cryo>6%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

1.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by <cryo>7%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

2.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

3.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by <cryo>9%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

4.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by <cryo>10%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.
